Package com.cosmicraiders

package com.cosmicraiders
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AssetSet
    This class saves textures, sounds and music as static attributes.
    Asteroid
    This class defines an Asteroid as a Circle and gives it a few more attributes.
    CollisionHandler
    This class handles all collisions of objects which are rendered.
    ConfigSet
    This class saves general game settings as static attributes.
    ControlSet
    This class manages the movement inputs for the fighter (player avatar).
    CosmicRaiders
    This instance of Game is the "root" of the libGDX class hierarchy.
    Debug
    This is a helper class which contains a method to show the coordinates of the mouse / touch pointer for debugging.
    Explosion
    This class serves to define what an explosion is, mainly its size, position, and lifespan.
    GameScreen
    Includes the main game logic as well as most GUI elements of the game.
    HorizontalCenteredGlyphLayout
    This class is a custom GlyphLayout which centers the text horizontally.
    MainMenuScreen
    This is the screen that is displayed when the game starts and between rounds.
    MovementHandler
    This class handles all movement for aliens, asteroids and lasers.
    Painter
    A Painter draws all the assets in the batch.
    PowerUp
    This class defines powerups.
    PowerUpHandler
    This class handles all power ups in the game.
    Scores
    This class keeps track of player scores.
    Spawner
    A Spawner creates objects in the game: aliens, alien lasers and fighter lasers.
